We work in an environment where empowered, self directed All-stars know what they do is important. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>INTEGRITY: Our definition is “saying what you will do and then doing it!” We keep our promises to our customers and our employees.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes &amp; demonstrate the ability to become proficient in the use of proprietary operational systems.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer for customer service, talks with customers by phone and in person, to receive orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrate effective use of software applications, at a minimum MS Word and Excel proficient.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements and resolve problems or complaints.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Work in a fast paced, cooperative, high call volume environment. Solicit sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Cover for the reception desk when necessary.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL EFFORT:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work environment is an office setting. Areas are clean, ventilated, and well lighted. Our Customer Service Reps normally have their own workstation or cubicle space and are equipped with a telephone, headset, and computer. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>CSR call areas can be noisy and work may be repetitious and stressful, with little time in between calls, while still providing excellent service. Some calls are evaluated to ensure high standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Also, long periods spent sitting, typing, or looking at a computer screen are common. <\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ability to read, write, comprehend and communicate in English. High school diploma or equivalent preferred.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> 2 years of Customer Service experience.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with MS Word, Excel, and Email <i>preferred<\u002Fi>. Typing and 10-key skills are required.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent organization and communication skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to analyze and solve problems. Gather data, compile information, and prepare reports.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> To be considered for any of our current openings you must complete an application at <\u002Fb><b>www.wasteconnections.com<\u002Fb>. CA<\u002Fb>!<\u002Fp>\n <p> The schedule will be <b>Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm<\u002Fb>. Starting pay will be <b>$19 per hour, depending on experience<\u002Fb>.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes &amp; demonstrate the ability to become proficient in the use of proprietary operational systems.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer for customer service, talks with customers by phone and in person, to receive orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrate effective use of software applications, at a minimum MS Word and Excel proficient.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements and resolve problems or complaints in a courteous manner<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Work in a fast paced, cooperative, high call volume environment with very detailed expectations<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Solicit sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Assist in other areas as needed<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><br> WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL EFFORT:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work environment is in a call center. Areas are clean, ventilated, and well lighted. Our Customer Service Reps normally have their own workstation or cubicle space and are equipped with a telephone, headset, and computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> CSR call areas can be noisy and work may be repetitious and stressful, with little time in between calls, while still providing excellent service. Some calls are evaluated to ensure high standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Also, long periods spent sitting, typing, or looking at a computer screen are very common.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> 2 years of Customer Service experience in a high call volume atmosphere.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to read, write, comprehend and communicate in English.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> High school diploma or equivalent preferred.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with MS Word, Excel, and Email preferred. Typing and 10-key skills are required.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent organizational and communication skills.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Ability to analyze and solve problems. Gather data, compile information, and prepare reports.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Bilingual in English and Spanish is a huge plus<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> To be considered for any of our current openings you must complete an application at <\u002Fb><b>www.wasteconnections.com<\u002Fb>. Join us and be a part of a winning team!<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2>\n <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2>\n <ul>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Work in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes &amp; demonstrate the ability to become proficient in the use of proprietary operational systems.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer for customer service, talks with customers by phone and in person, to receive orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Demonstrate effective use of software applications, at a minimum MS Word and Excel proficient.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements and resolve problems or complaints.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Work in a fast paced, cooperative, high call volume environment. Solicit sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Data entry in multiple systems.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Organizing documents, files, and other records<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Basic bookkeeping working in conjunction with accounting team.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL EFFORT:<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2>\n <ul>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Work environment is an office setting. Areas are clean, ventilated, and well lighted. Our Customer Service Reps normally have their own workstation or cubicle space and are equipped with a telephone, headset, and computer.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> CSR call areas can be noisy and work may be repetitious and stressful, with little time in between calls, while still providing excellent service. Some calls are evaluated to ensure high standards.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Also, long periods spent sitting, typing, or looking at a computer screen are common.<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2><\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fb><\u002Fh2>\n <ul>\n  <li><h2 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b> Ability to read, write, comprehend and communicate in English. We provide competitive benefits and lots of room for individual growth as the company expands. Because we operate with a highly decentralized structure, we look for individuals who are energetic and have individual initiative and creativity. Join us and be a part of a winning team!<\u002Fp>\n       <p><\u002Fp>\n       <p> DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n       <ul>\n        <li> Ability to safely operate a garbage truck on specified routes to collect solid waste.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> Ability to read route sheets and service each customer identified on the sheet or assigned by the dispatcher.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> Perform routine inspection and maintenance on vehicles such as checking fluids, safety equipment, and tires.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> Ability to perform a physically demanding job, loading and unloading, at times with no helpers.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> Courteous interaction with our customers and perform other miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned.<\u002Fli>\n       <\u002Ful>\n       <p><\u002Fp>\n       <p> WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL EFFORT:<\u002Fp>\n       <ul>\n        <li> Extensive physical activity. Requires strenuous physical work; heavy lifting, pushing, or pulling required of objects over 50 pounds.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> Work environment involves some exposure to physical risks such as moving mechanical parts which require following basic safety precautions.<\u002Fli>\n        <li> The employee is exposed to outside weather, including frequent wet and\u002For humid conditions, as well as exposure to fumes and vibration. <p>Livermore Sanitation, a Waste Connections company, is looking for a <i>high energy<\u002Fi> <b>Customer Service Representative<\u002Fb> to join our team in <b>Livermore, CA!<\u002Fb> Previous waste experience would be a huge <i>plus<\u002Fi>! <\u002Fp>\n <p>The schedule will be <b>Monday-Friday, 7 or 8am to 5pm.<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p> The starting pay rate is <b>$25\u002Fhour<\u002Fb>. The pay range for this job is $25.00 - 27.35\u002Fhour. We also offer great family benefits, 401k with a company match, vacation time, etc.<\u002Fp>\n <p><br> Waste Connections has many stable opportunities for qualified and motivated individuals who want to be part of a dynamic organization. We provide competitive benefits and lots of room for individual growth as the company expands. Because we operate with a highly decentralized structure, we look for individuals who are energetic and have individual initiative and creativity. Join us and be a part of a winning team!<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes &amp; demonstrate the ability to become proficient in the use of proprietary operational systems.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer for customer service, talks with customers by phone and in person, to receive orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrate effective use of software applications, at a minimum MS Word and Excel proficient.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements and resolve problems or complaints.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Work in a fast paced, cooperative, high call volume environment. Solicit sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Cover for the reception desk when necessary.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> WORKING CONDITIONS AND PHYSICAL EFFORT:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Work environment is an office setting. Areas are clean, ventilated, and well lighted. Our Customer Service Reps normally have their own workstation or cubicle space and are equipped with a telephone, headset, and computer. <\u002Fli>\n  <li>CSR call areas can be noisy and work may be repetitious and stressful, with little time in between calls, while still providing excellent service. Some calls are evaluated to ensure high standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Also, long periods spent sitting, typing, or looking at a computer screen are common. <\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Ability to read, write, comprehend and communicate in English. raise concerning service or billing. A successful CSR must understand the Waste Connections business, so they can resolve various types of customer issues. Customer Service Representatives must show empathy or sensitivity to the customer regarding the issue at hand.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> Job Duties:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Works in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Effectively communicates issues, needs and opportunities with customer service employees and other managers &amp; solicits sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Talks with customers by phone or in person and receives orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records, and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Take payments, bank deposits, key word orders, keys production paperwork and general office duties.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Adjusts complaints concerning billing or service rendered, referring complaints of service failures to designated departments for investigation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates the knowledge and effective use of software applications. issues.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> 2 years of Customer Service experience in a high call volume atmosphere.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> High <p>We are looking for a <b>Customer Service Representative<\u002Fb> to join the team at our Hauling location in <b>Charleston, SC<\u002Fb>.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> The Customer Service Representative (CSR) fields calls from Customers and works to resolve problems they raise concerning service or billing. A successful CSR must understand the Waste Connections business, so they can resolve various types of customer issues. Customer Service Representatives must show empathy or sensitivity to the customer regarding the issue at hand.<\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Job Duties:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Works in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Effectively communicates issues, needs and opportunities with customer service employees and other managers &amp; solicits sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Talks with customers by phone or in person and receives orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records, and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Take payments, bank deposits, key word orders, keys production paperwork and general office duties<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Adjusts complaints concerning billing or service rendered, referring complaints of service failures to designated departments for investigation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates the knowledge and effective use of software applications. These systems should include as a minimum, MS Word and Excel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements, resolve problems or complaints, and seeks cost-effective, safe environmentally sound solutions to service issues.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> 2 years of Customer Service experience in a high call volume atmosphere.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> High school diploma or equivalent.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel and E-Mail, proficient in 10 key, keyboarding and typing skills a must<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Solid Waste Industry Experience and or related field is <i>preferred<\u002Fi>.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent verbal communications skills.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p> Successful candidates are those who seek to thrive in an environment of operational excellence and accountability. Some calls are evaluated to ensure high standards.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Also, long periods spent sitting, typing, or looking at a computer screen are common.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> MINIMUM JOB REQUIREMENTS:<\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> 2 years of Phone Customer Service experience required<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with MS Word, Excel, and Email <i>preferred<\u002Fi>. <p>We are looking for a <i>High Energy<\u002Fi> <b>Customer Service Representative<\u002Fb> to join the team at our GROOT Hauling location in <b>Elk Grove , IL<\u002Fb>.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> The Customer Service Representative (CSR) fields calls from Customers and works to resolve problems they raise concerning service or billing. A successful CSR will become competent in the services and processes offered, so they can resolve various types of customer issues. Customer Service Representatives must show empathy or sensitivity to the customer regarding the issue at hand.<\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Job Duties:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Works in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Effectively communicates issues, needs and opportunities with customer service employees and other managers &amp; solicits sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Talks with customers by phone or in person and receives orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records, and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Take payments, bank deposits, key word orders, keys production paperwork and general office duties<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Adjusts complaints concerning billing or service rendered, referring complaints of service failures to designated departments for investigation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates the knowledge and effective use of software applications. These systems should include as a minimum, MS Word and Excel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements, resolve problems or complaints, and seeks cost-effective, safe environmentally sound solutions to service issues.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> High school diploma or equivalent.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel and E-Mail, proficient in 10 key, keyboarding and typing skills a must<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent verbal communications skills.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> Successful candidates are those who seek to thrive in an environment of operational excellence and accountability. problems they raise concerning service or billing. Customer Service Representatives must show empathy or sensitivity to the customer regarding the issue at hand.<\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Job Duties:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Works in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Effectively communicates issues, needs and opportunities with customer service employees and other managers &amp; solicits sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Talks with customers by phone or in person and receives orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records, and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Take payments, bank deposits, key word orders, keys production paperwork and general office duties<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Adjusts complaints concerning billing or service rendered, referring complaints of service failures to designated departments for investigation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates the knowledge and effective use of software applications. <p><b>Who Are We?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> WASTE CONNECTIONS, Inc. (NYSE: WCN): is a non-hazardous solid waste services company that provides solid waste collection, transfer, disposal, and recycling services in 46 states in the U.S. and 6 provinces in Canada. Our 18,000+ employees foster a work culture of Servant Leadership.<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> Our goal is to create an environment where self-directed, empowered employees strive to consistently fulfill our constituent commitments and seek to create positive impacts through interactions with customers, communities, and fellow employees, always relying on our Operating Values as the foundation for our existence. <\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p>Because we operate with a highly decentralized structure, we look for individuals who are energetic and have individual initiative and creativity. Bring your passion to succeed and you’ll quickly discover that great opportunities are all around you. At Waste Connections, you’ll thrive if you are friendly, dedicated, and prefer a work hard\u002Fplay harder culture that is focused on maintaining our reputation as the premier waste services company in the markets we serve.<br> <\u002Fp>\n <p> <br> <b>Why you need to join us!<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> Waste Connections is not only the best waste services company in North America, it is also an amazing place to realize your potential, make decisions, have your voice heard, and partner with extremely hard working and passionate people! We seek servant leaders, mentors, top performers, and fun people. At Waste Connections, we value each individual’s unique background, experience, and passion to make us a great place to work. <\u002Fp>\n <p><i>Our people mean everything to us.<\u002Fi><\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <ul>\n   <li><br> <b>CULTURE:<\u002Fb> It’s a Great place to work! We work in an environment where empowered, self-directed all-stars know what they do is important.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <ul>\n   <li><br> <b>INTEGRITY:<\u002Fb> Our definition is “saying what you will do and then doing it!” We keep our promises to our customers and our employees.<\u002Fli>\n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> The Position:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <p> We are looking for a <i>High Energy<\u002Fi> <b>Customer Service Representative<\u002Fb> to join the team at our Hauling location in <b>Charlotte, NC<\u002Fb>. Previous waste experience would be a huge <i>plus<\u002Fi>!<\u002Fp>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p> The Customer Service Representative (CSR) fields calls from Customers and works to resolve problems they raise concerning service or billing. A successful CSR must understand the Waste Connections business, so they can resolve various types of customer issues. Customer Service Representatives must show empathy or sensitivity to the customer regarding the issue at hand.<\u002Fp>\n <p><b><br> Job Duties:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> Works in conjunction with other departments to resolve customer disputes.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Effectively communicates issues, needs and opportunities with customer service employees and other managers &amp; solicits sale of new or additional services.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Interviews customers and records interview information into computer.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Talks with customers by phone or in person and receives orders for installation, turn on, discontinuance, or change in service.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Fills out contract forms, determines charges for service requested, collects deposits, prepares change of address records, and issues discontinuance orders.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Take payments, bank deposits, key word orders, keys production paperwork and general office duties<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Adjusts complaints concerning billing or service rendered, referring complaints of service failures to designated departments for investigation.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Demonstrates the knowledge and effective use of software applications. These systems should include as a minimum, MS Word and Excel.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Delivers services to customers in a manner that promotes goodwill. Interacts with customers and Waste Connections employees to determine service requirements, resolve problems or complaints, and seeks cost-effective, safe environmentally sound solutions to service issues.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p><\u002Fp>\n <p><b> Requirements:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <ul>\n  <li> 2 years of Customer Service experience in a high call volume atmosphere.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> High school diploma or equivalent.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel and E-Mail, proficient in 10 key, keyboarding and typing skills a must<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Solid Waste Industry Experience and or related field is <i>preferred<\u002Fi>.<\u002Fli>\n  <li> Excellent verbal communications skills.<\u002Fli>\n <\u002Ful>\n <p> Successful candidates are those who seek to thrive in an environment of operational excellence and accountability. We offer excellent benefits including: medical, dental, vision, flexible spending account, long term disability, life insurance, 401K retirement and unlimited opportunities to <b>\"Connect with Your Future\"<\u002Fb>.<\u002Fp>\n <p> Waste Connections is an Affirmative Action\u002FEqual Opportunity Employer
